subject: Unit testing a method that contains objects
msgSnippet: Hi All, I just got started with TDD and would like seek help you from the experts in this mailing-list. I have a business service layer that calls a third
messageBody:
Hi All,

I just got started with TDD and would like seek help you from the
experts in this mailing-list.

I have a business service layer that calls a third party application:

public Object fetchSomething() {

SomeClass obj = new SomeClasss();

obj.set(...);

Object returnObj = obj.retrieveSomething();

return Obj;

}

When writing a test case, I don't know how to mock the third party
object to return data for testing purposes. Could someone gives let me
know what is the best approach to test the above code using JUnit?

Thank you in advance for your help.

Regarads,
Lee
